meanings.definition: A tournament or competition in which knights or warriors engage in combat.
meanings.sent1: The tourneys were filled with knights in shining armor.
meanings.sent2: The annual tourneys always drew a large crowd of spectators.
meanings.sent3: The tourneys turned the battlefield into a stage for honor.
meanings.sent4: In the world of tourneys, victory is the ultimate prize.
meanings.sent5: The clash of swords echoed through the tourneys, a symphony of bravery.

meanings.definition: To participate in a tournament or competition.
meanings.sent1: He eagerly tourneys to prove his skills in combat.
meanings.sent2: She decided to tourneys in the archery competition.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel tourneys in the nut-gathering challenge.
meanings.sent4: The students tourneys for the spelling bee championship.
meanings.sent5: The athletes tourneys for the gold medal, giving their all in the race.

meanings.definition: A series of games or matches played in a tournament.
meanings.sent1: The tourneys included chess, checkers, and card games.
meanings.sent2: Each team played their best in the tourneys to reach the finals.
meanings.sent3: The tourneys of mini-golf brought out the competitive spirit in everyone.
meanings.sent4: The tourneys of the mind challenged the participants to think strategically.
meanings.sent5: The tourneys of skill and luck tested the players' abilities to the limit.
